entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued April 09 at 11:05AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Water levels rising on creeks and streams in Inyo County... Snowmelt in the southern Sierra Nevada of Inyo will start to accelerate with the onset of warmer temperatures. entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued April 10 at 5:18AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snow melt flooding across Humboldt County River/Creek basins... Warm afternoon temperatures will combine with an above normal higher elevation snow pack to lead to increased snowmelt runoff across portions of Humboldt County. High temperatures across the area will reach the upper 60s to lower 70s for today and Tuesday of this week. Local streams are likely to see increased daytime streamflows.
